original_text: He will bring light to people who are living without God. It is like those people are living in the dark. They are afraid to die. But he will shine on them. He will show us how to live so that we will not be afraid.’ 1: God told Zechariah what John would do. John would speak to the people. He would tell them that Jesus was coming. He will bring light to people who are living without God. It is like those people are living in the dark. They are afraid to die. But he will shine on them. He will show us how to live so that we will not be afraid.’ 1: God told Zechariah what John would do. John would speak to the people. He would tell them that Jesus was coming. He will bring light to people who are living without God.
korean_text: 어둠과 죽음의 그늘에 앉은 자에게 비치고 우리 발을 평강의 길로 인도하시리로다 하니라

sentences.original_text: to people who are living without God
It is like those people are living in the dark
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 마치 그 사람들이 어둠 속에 사는 것과 같습니다

sentences.original_text: But he will shine on them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그가 그들 위에 비출 것입니다

sentences.original_text: He will show us how to live
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리에게 어떻게 살아야 하는지 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: so that we will not be afraid
John would speak to the people
